data.comment: The big names in today's match at Mapei Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Daniel Amabile, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Udinese needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Daniel Amabile awards the away team a throw-in.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Daniel Amabile.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniel Amabile.
Federico Peluso (Sassuolo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo pushes forward through Jeremy Toljan, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Udinese.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Throw-in for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 11, Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Udinese just outside Sassuolo's area.
Federico Peluso (Sassuolo) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In Reggio Emilia, Samir (Udinese) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 12, Daniel Amabile awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Francesco Caputo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
Jeremy Toljan (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Reggio Emilia Udinese attack through Kevin Lasagna. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Udinese push forward at Mapei Stadium and Rodrigo De Paul gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sassuolo defence.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
In the minute 18, Hamed Junior Traore for the home team is judged to be offside.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniel Amabile awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 22, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Amabile signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Udinese's half.
Jens Stryger Larsen for Udinese gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Filip Djuricic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
In the minute 27, Sassuolo's Hamed Junior Traore gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Udinese.
Rogerio (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Sassuolo drive upfield and Manuel Locatelli gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Udinese defender.
In Reggio Emilia, Stefano Okaka of Udinese is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 37, Daniel Amabile signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Sassuolo's area.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Daniel Amabile.
Sebastien De Maio (Udinese) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 39, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Hamed Junior Traore for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniel Amabile.
In the minute 40, Daniel Amabile awards Udinese a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 43, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Udinese.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Stefano Okaka fires in a strike for Udinese.
At Mapei Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Daniel Amabile has blown to start the second-half.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
In the minute 48, Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Daniel Amabile.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 52, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese take a 0-1 lead thanks to Stefano Okaka.
In the minute 53, Kevin Lasagna with an assist there.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Daniel Amabile signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Udinese's half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
The home team have replaced Hamed Junior Traore with Lukas Haraslin. This is the first substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
The home team replace Filip Djuricic with Giacomo Raspadori.
Goal kick for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Udinese's William Troost-Ekong breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mehdi Bourabia gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
In the minute 62, Seko Fofana is replacing Marvin Zeegelaar for the away team.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo attack through Giacomo Raspadori. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, Udinese have a goal kick.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Giacomo Raspadori. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
Andrea Ghion is on a sub for Manuel Locatelli for Sassuolo.
In the minute 68, Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Daniel Amabile awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 78, In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo make their fourth substitution with Mert Muldur replacing Jeremy Toljan.
In the minute 82, Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's fifth substitution at Mapei Stadium with Stefano Piccinini replacing Rogerio.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a second substitution, with Ilija Nestorovski replacing Stefano Okaka.
Mehdi Bourabia of Sassuolo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 84, Udinese make their third substitution with Hidde Ter Avest replacing Ken Sema.
Lukas Haraslin (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Giacomo Raspadori gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Udinese defender.
Goal kick for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
In Reggio Emilia, Kevin Lasagna of Udinese is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ilija Nestorovski for Udinese drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Daniel Amabile.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Amabile awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Giacomo Raspadori of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Daniel Amabile signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Martin Palumbo is replacing Walace for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
Juan Musso (Udinese) gets a yellow card.
